atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use @theme to define your design system tokens inline in CSS.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Use @custom-variant to define custom variant selectors.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use @layer to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: You can generate responsive, hover, focus, and other variants of your own utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @variants directive.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: You can generate responsive variants of your own utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @responsive directive.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: The @screen directive allows you to create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name.
